text: Egh ia gol ringɨn pumuning uam aningɨn ingarigh, egh aning isɨ korotiar otevir ivariamɨn amadaghan itimɨn, azenan aning porogh aning isamigh. Egh aning ikeghtɨ, aningɨn otevimning dɨpɨzimningɨn ikegha izighirɨ inir ruarir ivariam gikezimɨn tugh. Egh ivariam gikezir inir me deraghavɨra kurkezir kam an boroghɨn, gol ringning isamigh.
